Welcome

Welcome to my blog. I am a frontend .NET web developer (mainly ASP.net MVC with C#). At home I use Linux exclusively and code in Python, Haskell, PHP (with the excellent Laravel framework), or any other language that fits the bill.

I plan to post about programming mainly, but I may also post on other topics as well. Stay tuned – or don’t (I won’t hate you).

P.S.

“Expositus” is Latin for “open” and “accessible”.
